scripts.build:css: postcss assets/styles/main.css -o dist/styles/main.min.v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"').css
scripts.build:js: esbuild assets/scripts/main.scripts.js --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/scripts/main.min.v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"').js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run update:html
scripts.watch:css: chokidar 'assets/styles/**/*.css' -c 'npm run build:css && npm run update:html'
scripts.watch:js: chokidar 'assets/scripts/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build:js && npm run update:html'
scripts.dev: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
